description: This speedloader can hold 6 rounds of .410 shot or .45 Colt and quickly reload a compatible revolver. Obviously, it won't work on reproductions of the Colt Single Action Army.
25-round casket magazine for the .410 Smoothbore Machine Pistol.
40-round casket magazine for the .410 Smoothbore Machine Pistol.

A stack of three box magazines from the Saiga-410 lined up and tied together to feed shells to the multiple barrels of the OCG410 Triarii. It is less efficient in volume and unreliable compared to the proprietary magazine for it.

This proprietary magazine evenly distributes its rounds to the separate feeding mechanisms of the Triarii triple barrel .410 shotgun. Because it has to be lined up and attached to feed three separate barrels, loading it is somewhat tricky.
